string.text: Kevlar Plates
Reinforced plates that last longer but are less durable.
Polycarbonate Plates
Polycarbonate plates don't last long, but they're more reliable than Kevlar thanks to improved bullet impulse negation.
Duplicate Protective Plate Layer
Armor with an inner layer that spreads impact over a greater area.
Mobile Protective Joint Plates
Mobile plates protect joints from gunshot wounds.
Segmented Protection
Thinner sheets of armor are layered to increase wear-resistance.
Additional Aluminum/Titanium Plates
An increased number of plates considerably improves body armor durability.
Backup Mobile Layer
Mobile plates protect joints from wounds.
Thickened Leather Inserts
Used in suits to improve outfit durability.
High Durability Protective Frame
Used in suits to improve outfit durability.
Reinforced Kevlar Plates & Inserts
Reinforced plates that last longer to improve outfit durability.
Solid Carbon Components
Replace metal with carbon fiber to reduce weight without sacrificing reliability.
Lighter Aluminum Frame
Replace some frame pieces with lightweight aluminum.
Lighter Synthetic & Plastic Components
Use of lighter materials to reduce weight.
Lighter, Synthetic & Polymer Materials
Replace fabric, clips and thickeners with lighter synthetic materials to reduce weight.
Mount System
A system of mounts allows for weight to be distributed onto the body more evenly.
Weight Distribution Back Frame
Relieves focused shoulder load from carried weight by distributing it across the body.
Additional Servomotors
Additional movement devices allow the maximum carried load to be increased.
Constantan-based Inner Layer
A thin layer of constantan is capable of isolating against electricity.
Constantan-based Thermal Inserts
Constantan is capable of isolating against electricity and has a very high melting point.
Bodysuit with Manganin Inserts
This nickel and magnesium alloy is used in armor to prevent electric shocks.
Fire-resistant Fabric
Fabric treated with fire-resistant substances.
Magnesium Plate Inserts
Magnesium inserts protect the wearer from thermal dangers.
Thermal Fiberglass Protection
Fiberglass is used in bodysuits worn by natural disaster response teams.
Fire-resistant Bodysuit with Nickel Inserts
Nickel is sufficiently fire-resistant to be used for body armor inserts
Thunderbird Constantan Face Armor
Protective alloy frame to prevent thermal and electrical damage.
Rubberized Bodysuit Fabric
Rubber is a basic way of protection from brief radiation exposure.
Plexiglass Inner Layer
Plexiglass absorbs two types of radiation while being a lot lighter than lead.
Lead Installation
Lead absorbs all three types of radiation.
Active Filters
Active filters can resist radioactive particles.
Plexiglass Coating
A plexiglass mask can provide partial protection from radiation.
Reinforced Respirator
A filter with an additional purification coating and a system for removal of poisons.
Canvas Bodysuit
Basic protection against rain and caustic substances.
Airtight Plastic Inner Layer
Even a simple plastic inner layer can protect the wearer from chemical hazards.
Impregnated Bodysuit Fabric
Impregnated fabric should prevent chemical poisoning.
Lifesaver Plexiglass Bodysuit with Flexible Lead Mesh
The lead mesh creates unbreachable chemical protection without sacrificing mobility.
Reinforced Filter
A filter with a reinforced anti-corrosive coating and an additional preventing layer for removal of poisons.
Impregnated Breathing Mask
Respirator for the total blocking of poisons.
Steel Grill Psy-protection Band
A closed band that has been demonstrated to provide partial protection against direct psy-emissions.
Psy-Dome Band
Hi-tech psy-protection that is said to have been invented by a scientist called Sakharov.
Primary Armor Attachment Module
Installation of an armor attachment module.
Additional Armor Attachment Module
Installation of an additional armor attachment module.
Two-compartment Armor Attachment Module
Installation of a two-compartment armor attachment module.
Internal Thermal Regulation System
Special mounts attached to the bodysuit allow for carried weight to feel lighter.
Built-in Athlete System
An experimental running system model of a running system.
Steam Purification & Respiration Filters
A set of filters used for breathing in contaminated air or air oat critical temperatures.
Ray Hemostimulator
A small wave emitter mounted on the back, effectively increasing blood clotting speed.
Hydra Hemoglobin Injector
A generation B injector that regularly introduces a coagulation agent into the bloodstream when blood pressure drops significantly.
Fury Adrenalin Injector
A generation A injector, developed by one of Kiev's research institutes. Regularly injects the bloodstream with tiny doses of adrenalin.
Phoenix Restoration System
An integrated system that monitors the wearer's health and supplies vitamins, adrenalin or anabolic substances as required.
Life Support System
A wave emitter mounted on the neck that has a strong calming effect.
Hydraulic Boosters
Allows sprinting while wearing an exo-frame. Used for fourth generation exoskeletons.
